name: Floating Flowers
description:
A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #179

Collect flowers from the floating islands!

Controls:

W: Jump (can also jump in air once before having to land)

A/D: Move

S: Drop through islands

Gam Jam bugs:

Sometimes the flower spawns behind you, you have to move away from it and then back to collect.

Sometimes when landing on a moving platform you'll be sent into the void.
